text:
Hello all, good to be here. Hope all is with you. My name is Hadra Ahmed, Ethiopian based freelance journalist working with local and international media outlets. I also run a media and communications company, Nubia. We work on Media, communications, technology consultancy; TV, radio, digital productions; public relations; strategy and etc.
We are currently working on various videos for awareness with doctors mainly but also have artists and citizens lined up for more work. We are also supporting a volunteer group #doingmypart and so far we have:
·        Set up hand washing stations in various areas of Kazanchis. We plan to do the same in Megenagna ane Piazza. Also provide soap for those who already set up stations.
·        Donated groceries to households of the vulnerable, low income families and elderly
·        Currently finalising to distribute groceries and sanitary materials including masks and gloves to street sweepers
·        Create awareness materials such as posters, videos and etc.
Our team and resources are available for anyone who would like to contribute and work together from Addis.
Cheers, H.

elements.text:

I also run a media and communications company, Nubia. We work on Media, communications, technology consultancy; TV, radio, digital productions; public relations; strategy and etc.
We are currently working on various videos for awareness with doctors mainly but also have artists and citizens lined up for more work. We are also supporting a volunteer group #doingmypart and so far we have:
·        Set up hand washing stations in various areas of Kazanchis. We plan to do the same in Megenagna ane Piazza. Also provide soap for those who already set up stations.
·        Donated groceries to households of the vulnerable, low income families and elderly
·        Currently finalising to distribute groceries and sanitary materials including masks and gloves to street sweepers
·        Create awareness materials such as posters, videos and etc.
Our team and resources are available for anyone who would like to contribute and work together from Addis.
Cheers, H.

text: Joining late on this and please let me know what we can do urgently now or if there is anything we can help with that is on the pipeline.

Hello <@U011D592LP8>
Thank you for joining this project.
I saw your introduction yesterday and sent you a DM.
Lets talk about your masks and gloves initiates.

text: <@U0107JERE9L> <@UVALAR52P> Here is a link to an open source project that is using Medtroinic's design file. There is already a group that is working on it and have made it opensource. This is what I would suggest- Let us have a team of three people who can take responsibility of - hardware design, software design and mechanical design. We can work in parallel with this group <https://gitlab.com/openventilator> and we can work closely with the Addis Abeba Science and Technology University AASTU to have the prototype tested. I can take responsibility of the PCB layout design, fabrication of the boards and assembly of the boards. Eventually we can have the board assembly be done in Ethiopia. But for now we can focus on getting on prototype so it is tested. Please let me know what you think.

attachments.title: openventilator
attachments.text: Collection of files for the Open Ventilator project

elements.text: Here is a link to an open source project that is using Medtroinic's design file. There is already a group that is working on it and have made it opensource. This is what I would suggest- Let us have a team of three people who can take responsibility of - hardware design, software design and mechanical design. We can work in parallel with this group

and we can work closely with the Addis Abeba Science and Technology University AASTU to have the prototype tested. I can take responsibility of the PCB layout design, fabrication of the boards and assembly of the boards. Eventually we can have the board assembly be done in Ethiopia. But for now we can focus on getting on prototype so it is tested. Please let me know what you think.

text:
Hello <@U010RM5TX1R> - Thank you so much for joining us. <@UVALAR52P> mentioned your expertise to me. There has been an interest in working on this given the number of ICU beds in Ethiopia.
Let us discuss some of these things in the DM.

elements.text: Hello
- Thank you so much for joining us.

mentioned your expertise to me. There has been an interest in working on this given the number of ICU beds in Ethiopia.
Let us discuss some of these things in the DM.

text: <@U0107JERE9L> Nice to meet you. By the way I have been able to convert Medtronic's PADS PCB design into Altium Design. If this is the only board that is needed to take care of the electronics part of it, I don't think it is going to cost that much to fabricate the bare board. I have to look at the BOM to have an estimate of the cost for the assembly. I think it is good to have a team working on this so we can focus on one project and complete in certain time. We also need a project manager who can oversee the process and keep everyone accountable.

elements.text: Nice to meet you. By the way I have been able to convert Medtronic's PADS PCB design into Altium Design. I have to look at the BOM to have an estimate of the cost for the assembly. I think it is good to have a team working on this so we can focus on one project and complete in certain time. We also need a project manager who can oversee the process and keep everyone accountable.

text: Glad to see all of us here. We need to take Gobena's recommendation seriously to make this work. He has already done some of the heavy lifting including the potential to fabricate one of the critical components in Ethiopia. We really need the engineers and project planners to join here

elements.text: Glad to see all of us here. We need to take Gobena's recommendation seriously to make this work. He has already done some of the heavy lifting including the potential to fabricate one of the critical components in Ethiopia. We really need the engineers and project planners to join here

text:
Agreed <@UVALAR52P> and <@U010RM5TX1R> - If there is a feasibility to get EFDA approval, this project may be critical in increasing the number of ICU beds available.

<@UV8B0679P> <@U010JHVF19U> <@U01022PTXA7> <@U010NBXJN06> <@U010L4E6BK9> <@U0107AXNR4Z> <@U011J64BXCY> <@U010B22ESES> <@U010H9HHT4M> <@U010P2VU7ND>

and
- If there is a feasibility to get EFDA approval, this project may be critical in increasing the number of ICU beds available.

text: <@U010RM5TX1R> <@U0107JERE9L> <@UVALAR52P> what type of engineers are we looking for electrical mechanical or both? Let me know and I’ll go find people on the ground. If there is any specific skills set you guys require it would also help.

elements.text: what type of engineers are we looking for electrical mechanical or both? Let me know and I’ll go find people on the ground. If there is any specific skills set you guys require it would also help.

text: Selam <@U011J64BXCY> I think we will need both Electrical and Mechanical engineers as well as software engineers. The work is already done. We will only need to make sure that there is nothing missed during the process. Let us think of it this way - seeing the fact that there are only less than 100 ventilators in our country, even if we don't make it on time for this urgency it will be used right away.

elements.text: Selam

I think we will need both Electrical and Mechanical engineers as well as software engineers. The work is already done. We will only need to make sure that there is nothing missed during the process. Let us think of it this way - seeing the fact that there are only less than 100 ventilators in our country, even if we don't make it on time for this urgency it will be used right away.

text:
This is a simple prototype for a mechanical/electrical ventilator using ambu bags.

It is build with adruino, meaning we can control,

-Breath per minute(12,15,18,20) or any

-Pressure of breath

It can also run on battery for remote areas.

elements.text:
This is a simple prototype for a mechanical/electrical ventilator using ambu bags.

It is build with adruino, meaning we can control,

-Breath per minute(12,15,18,20) or any

-Pressure of breath

It can also run on battery for remote areas.

text: <@U0107JERE9L>

Thank you  <@U010L4E6BK9> -
The fact that it can be used by battery is very encouraging. We are going to create a team for ventilators and have engineers like you in it to discuss the most feasible alternatives.

elements.text: Thank you

-
The fact that it can be used by battery is very encouraging. We are going to create a team for ventilators and have engineers like you in it to discuss the most feasible alternatives.

text: <@U0107JERE9L> can you add me when you create the group? I work as a Biomedical Engineer at Medtronic supporting ventilators and other respiratory products. I reached out to a couple of engineering teams in Ethiopia working on ventilator prototypes to support but I haven't heard back. I have tons of resources and info that can help them with prototyping medical devices related to Covid-19.
